tags.name: openapi
tags.description: methods that query for OpenAPI specifications

200.description: array of all job information in slurmctld

default.description: Association not found or unable to delete association
User not found or unable to delete user
User not found or not able to update user
Cluster not found or unable to delete cluster
wckey not found or unable to delete wckey
Unable to add or update accounts

parameters.name: submit_time
parameters.description:
Filter by submission time
 Accepted formats:
 HH:MM[:SS] [AM|PM]
MMDD[YY] or MM/DD[/YY] or MM.DD[.YY]
MM/DD[/YY]-HH:MM[:SS]
YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM[:SS]]

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description:
Filter by start time
 Accepted formats:
 HH:MM[:SS] [AM|PM]
MMDD[YY] or MM/DD[/YY] or MM.DD[.YY]
MM/DD[/YY]-HH:MM[:SS]
YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM[:SS]]

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description:
Filter by end time
 Accepted formats:
 HH:MM[:SS] [AM|PM]
MMDD[YY] or MM/DD[/YY] or MM.DD[.YY]
MM/DD[/YY]-HH:MM[:SS]
YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM[:SS]]

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of accounts to match

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of associations to match

parameters.name: cluster
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of cluster to match

parameters.name: constraints
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of constraints to match

parameters.name: disable_wait_for_result
parameters.description: Disable waiting for result from slurmdbd

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of formats to match

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of groups to match

parameters.name: job_name
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of job names to match

parameters.name: partition
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of partitions to match

parameters.name: qos
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of QOS to match

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of job reasons to match

parameters.name: reservation
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of reservations to match

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of states to match

parameters.name: step
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of job steps to match

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of used nodes to match

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of users to match

parameters.name: wckey
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of wckeys to match

account.description: Charge resources used by this job to specified account.

account_gather_freqency.description: Define the job accounting and profiling sampling intervals.

array.description: Submit a job array, multiple jobs to be executed with identical parameters. The indexes specification identifies what array index values should be used.

batch_features.description: features required for batch script's node

begin_time.description: Submit the batch script to the Slurm controller immediately, like normal, but tell the controller to defer the allocation of the job until the specified time.

cluster_constraints.description: Specifies features that a federated cluster must have to have a sibling job submitted to it.

core_specification.description: Count of specialized threads per node reserved by the job for system operations and not used by the application.

cores_per_socket.description: Restrict node selection to nodes with at least the specified number of cores per socket.

cpu_frequency.description: Request that job steps initiated by srun commands inside this sbatch script be run at some requested frequency if possible, on the CPUs selected for the step on the compute node(s).

cpus_per_gpu.description: Number of CPUs requested per allocated GPU.

cpus_per_task.description: Advise the Slurm controller that ensuing job steps will require ncpus number of processors per task.

current_working_directory.description: Instruct Slurm to connect the batch script's standard output directly to the file name.

deadline.description: Remove the job if no ending is possible before this deadline (start > (deadline - time[-min])).

delay_boot.description: Do not reboot nodes in order to satisfied this job's feature specification if the job has been eligible to run for less than this time period.

dependency.description: Defer the start of this job until the specified dependencies have been satisfied completed.

distribution.description: Specify alternate distribution methods for remote processes.

oneOf.description: The job allocation can share nodes just other users with the "user" option or with the "mcs" option).

get_user_environment.description: Load new login environment for user on job node.

gres.description: Specifies a comma delimited list of generic consumable resources.

gres_flags.description: Specify generic resource task binding options.

gpu_binding.description: Requested binding of tasks to GPU.

hold.description: Specify the job is to be submitted in a held state (priority of zero).

kill_on_invalid_dependency.description: If a job has an invalid dependency, then Slurm is to terminate it.

licenses.description: Specification of licenses (or other resources available on all nodes of the cluster) which must be allocated to this job.

mail_type.description: Notify user by email when certain event types occur.

mail_user.description: User to receive email notification of state changes as defined by mail_type.

mcs_label.description: This parameter is a group among the groups of the user.

memory_per_gpu.description: Minimum memory required per allocated GPU.

minimum_cpus_per_node.description: Minimum number of CPUs per node.

minimum_nodes.description: If a range of node counts is given, prefer the smaller count.

name.description: Specify a name for the job allocation.

nice.description: Run the job with an adjusted scheduling priority within Slurm.

no_kill.description: Do not automatically terminate a job if one of the nodes it has been allocated fails.

oneOf.description: Request that a minimum of minnodes nodes be allocated to this job.
Request that a minimum of minnodes nodes and a maximum node count.

open_mode.description: Open the output and error files using append or truncate mode as specified.

partition.description: Request a specific partition for the resource allocation.

qos.description: Request a quality of service for the job.

requeue.description: Specifies that the batch job should eligible to being requeue.

reservation.description: Allocate resources for the job from the named reservation.

signal.description: When a job is within sig_time seconds of its end time, send it the signal sig_num.

sockets_per_node.description: Restrict node selection to nodes with at least the specified number of sockets.

spread_job.description: Spread the job allocation over as many nodes as possible and attempt to evenly distribute tasks across the allocated nodes.

standard_error.description: Instruct Slurm to connect the batch script's standard error directly to the file name.

standard_in.description: Instruct Slurm to connect the batch script's standard input directly to the file name specified.

standard_out.description: Instruct Slurm to connect the batch script's standard output directly to the file name.

tasks.description: Advises the Slurm controller that job steps run within the allocation will launch a maximum of number tasks and to provide for sufficient resources.

tasks_per_core.description: Request the maximum ntasks be invoked on each core.

tasks_per_node.description: Request the maximum ntasks be invoked on each node.

tasks_per_socket.description: Request the maximum ntasks be invoked on each socket.

thread_specification.description: Count of specialized threads per node reserved by the job for system operations and not used by the application.

threads_per_core.description: Restrict node selection to nodes with at least the specified number of threads per core.

wait_all_nodes.description: Do not begin execution until all nodes are ready for use.

wckey.description: Specify wckey to be used with job.

average.description: Average time spent processing this RPC type

total.description: Total time spent processing this RPC type

average.description: Average time spent processing each user RPC

total.description: Total time spent processing each user RPC

direct.description: If user is coordinator of this account directly or coordinator status was inheirted from a higher account in the tree

exempt_time.description: Grace period (s) before jobs can preempted

tasks.description: Max running tasks in array at any one time

suspended.description: Timestamp of when job last suspended

seconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the system on behalf of the process (in kernel mode), in seconds

microseconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the system on behalf of the process (in kernel mode), in microseconds

seconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the job, in seconds

microseconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the job, in microseconds

seconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the job in user land, in seconds

microseconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the job in user land, in microseconds

job_offset.description: Offset of this job to parent

nodes.description: List of nodes allocated for job

working_directory.description: Directory where job was initially started

suspended.description: Timestamp of when job last suspended

seconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the system on behalf of the process (in kernel mode), in seconds

microseconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the system on behalf of the process (in kernel mode), in microseconds

seconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the job, in seconds

microseconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the job, in microseconds

seconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the job in user land, in seconds

microseconds.description: Total number of CPU-seconds used by the job in user land, in microseconds

count.description: Total number of nodes in step

actual_frequency.description: Actual frequency of CPU during step

schedule_cycle_mean.description: Average time for Schedule Max cycle

schedule_cycle_mean_depth.description: Average depth for Schedule Max cycle

bf_backfilled_jobs.description: Total backfilled jobs (since last slurm start)

bf_last_backfilled_jobs.description: Total backfilled jobs (since last stats cycle start)

allowed_allocation_nodes.description: list names of allowed allocating nodes

default_memory_per_cpu.description: default MB memory per allocated CPU

denied_accounts.description: comma delimited list of denied accounts

denied_qos.description: comma delimited list of denied qos

min_nodes_per_job.description: Min number of nodes per job

nodes.description: list names of nodes in partition

over_time_limit.description: job's time limit can be exceeded by this number of minutes before cancellation

total_nodes.description: Total number of nodes in partition

job_submit_user_msg.description: Message to user from job_submit plugin

script.description: Executable script (full contents) to run in batch step

job.description: Properties of an array job or non-HetJob

account.description: Charge resources used by this job to specified account

accrue_time.description: time job is eligible for running

array_job_id.description: job_id of a job array or 0 if N/A

array_max_tasks.description: Maximum number of running array tasks

array_task_string.description: string expression of task IDs in this record

batch_features.description: features required for batch script's node

batch_flag.description: if batch: queued job with script

batch_host.description: name of host running batch script

cluster.description: name of cluster that the job is on

cluster_features.description: comma separated list of required cluster features

cores_per_socket.description: cores per socket required by job

cpus_per_task.description: number of processors required for each task

cpus_per_tres.description: semicolon delimited list of TRES=# values

dependency.description: synchronize job execution with other jobs

derived_exit_code.description: highest exit code of all job steps

eligible_time.description: time job is eligible for running

end_time.description: time of termination, actual or expected

excluded_nodes.description: comma separated list of excluded nodes

features.description: comma separated list of required features

last_sched_evaluation.description: last time job was evaluated for scheduling

max_cpus.description: maximum number of cpus usable by job

max_nodes.description: maximum number of nodes usable by job

mcs_label.description: mcs_label if mcs plugin in use

memory_per_tres.description: semicolon delimited list of TRES=# values

nodes.description: list of nodes allocated to job

tasks_per_core.description: number of tasks to invoke on each core

tasks_per_socket.description: number of tasks to invoke on each socket

tasks_per_board.description: number of tasks to invoke on each board

cpus.description: minimum number of cpus required by job

node_count.description: minimum number of nodes required by job

pre_sus_time.description: time job ran prior to last suspend

required_nodes.description: comma separated list of required nodes

requeue.description: enable or disable job requeue option

shared.description: type and if job can share nodes with other jobs

sockets_per_board.description: sockets per board required by job

sockets_per_node.description: sockets per node required by job

start_time.description: time execution begins, actual or expected

state_reason.description: reason job still pending or failed

suspend_time.description: time job last suspended or resumed

threads_per_core.description: threads per core required by job

tres_per_job.description: semicolon delimited list of TRES=# values

tres_per_node.description: semicolon delimited list of TRES=# values

tres_per_socket.description: semicolon delimited list of TRES=# values

tres_per_task.description: semicolon delimited list of TRES=# values

user_id.description: user id the job runs as

sockets.description: assignment status of each socket by socket id

cores.description: assignment status of each core by core id

mcs_label.description: mcs label if mcs plugin in use

owner.description: User allowed to use this node

port.description: TCP port number of the slurmd

sockets.description: total number of sockets per node

weight.description: arbitrary priority of node for scheduling

info.title: Slurm Rest API
info.description: API to access and control Slurm.
